author: Gregory Stopka
text:
A member (population 360,000) is currently assessing its internal CDL training program and is looking for comparable municipalities.  Please fill out this short survey:  https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/K9GKDXS.   All who participated will receive the results. Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
title: CDL Internal Training
